title: Read (Method)
text:
METHOD Read : __XWORD
Reads at most
nBufSize
ASCII characters from the stream into
pDst
.
If an error occurs, 0 is returned, otherwise the number of characters read.
Note
The number of characters read may be less than
nBufSize
.

rows.Name: pDst
rows.Comment: The destination buffer, needs at least space fornBufSizecharacters

rows: The size of the destination buffer in bytes
